name: Federation of Lithuanian Forest and Wood Workers' Trade Unions
goal:
LMPF represents and defends the rights of trade union members. Actively participates in tripartite coordination of interests and cooperation, solving social, economic and labour issues, also participates in solving social and labour issues and disputes.
LMPF promotes social dialoge, initiate bilateral collective agreements with employersâ€™ organizations and organises
training of trade union representatives and employees; periodically organize conferences, seminars, forums etc.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Trade
